name: Shape of the Substance
description:
Shape of the Substance
You are a shape floating through psychedelic environment!

Made for the 2018 Spring #ue4jam game

Match the shape of the target. You change your shape via moving mouse pointer. 
Use space bar to travel faster.
Get high score. 

Disclosed assets:
GDC music assets
Epicstockmedia.com ‘Free Sounds Of The Month’

Creators:
Alexander Prokopchuk - Designer
Khizer - Programming
Ninjin42 - Programming
